original_text: All the living animals also went out of the ship. The birds and the living things that move across the ground all went out. Every different kind of animal came out of the ship, each of them in its own group.
korean_text: 땅 위의 동물 곧 모든 짐승과 모든 기는 것과 모든 새도 그 종류대로 방주에서 나왔더라

sentences.original_text: All the living animals also went out of the ship
The living things that move across the ground all went out
sentences.korean_translation: 땅을 기어 다니는 생물들도 모두 나왔다

sentences.original_text: Every different kind of animal came out of the ship
each of them in its own group
